name: Word Market 2
description:
Second installment of the popular Word Market game with brand new set of puzzles. New in this game: you can now redeem hidden words for extra bonus coins. Swipe your finger over the letters on the plate to form a word and unlock a fruit. Apples, strawberries, oranges, plums... Healthy! Guess all the words, give your brain some vitamins!

FEATURES
• discover new words
• easy to play
• hundreds of puzzles to solve for you and your friends
• excellent word game to keep your brain sharp
• made for phones and tablets

If you like crosswords and word puzzles, this game is for you and your friends. Download and enjoy!
